coded_answer.p: I am writtingwriting this letter to informeinform you about the decisions I have made according toregarding your questions.
First of all I would like to travel onin July because I will I have finished my exams by the end of June. I will not be able to travel onin August because I have found a job for that month.

Secondly I would prefer to be accommodateaccommodatedstay in a log cabinscabin. When I was a child I was affraidafraid of all these little insects that they live in the ground and this fear still remainremains till now. I also think that the log cabin will be much more confortablecomfortable than the tent.

asketballbasketballBasketball and swimming are the two activities I have chosen. I playhave played basketball since I was twelve years old and I amhave been a member of the basketball schoolschool basketball team for four years. In swimming I had wonwon the first priceprize ofin a local competition.
FinalyFinally I would like to ask you for some further informationsinformation about the clothes and the money we will need.
As you already know, last month I was helping at a pop concert. It was a very excitedexciting experience and I really enjoyed myself very much.
I didn't have to do somethinganything very difficult. I was only responsableresponsible for the property of the back stages. But if anyone was been askingasked for some help I was always there.

The most exciting thing about this experience was to meetmeeting all these well-known people. I was shocked and terrified the firtfirst time I saw them, but the truth is that they are men like us. They have a very simple life and behaviorbehaviour when they weren'taren't on the scenestage.
If I have the opportunity next month I really want to go back. I will definitely apply for a place.
